title: If you could write yourself a letter about what you are feeling right now, how would it go? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear Me, It is good that I'm writing you this as in you desperately need some advice and who is well good for the same other than myself lol man… Listen fella you need to Buck up and see the people around you acting freaking mean and you damn fool don't understand such a small notion. Oops, I know you do have disease of seeing good in everyone around you But the good you are you trying to spread …Is it even getting the recipient or not? Is recipient damn excited to receive your damn gift of Happiness or just freaking acting Dumb. Ha-ha Buddy you gotta be Lil selfish here maybe you need to be… I know you're already selfish but not upto the mark yet  Now the other me to the other me: I know buddy what I'm doing though people at times may not see what I do perceive ….. yeah People may think me for a fool but they are no less than a fool befooling themselves ignoring what they may achieve: peace with soul may be, relief from stress may be. People may see me as some yes man one who keep noding to whatever I'm listening to . But People I don't know if you really know me as in who I really am is . You may think me of some idiot trying to implore facts in some uncanny way but I'm talking some freaking realities, factual antiquities something far more unreachable from your mean conscience … I really don't know what I have been thinking while decided to write this but I know I'm doing well what is needed to be done. Making you Aware of your damn Realities, Making my peace with your Insanities, yet I'm one who is on the receiver Hitch…. “Be The Best Version Of You, Try Bringing Same to Other's Fortune” Regards Pankaj Pathania (पंकज पठानिया)
